attributes.action: Fund youth services in Stockland Green Birmingham. Successfull Youth Project closure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Funding for project ceased on March 31st 2008 and we have not received continual funding despite being a successful project, working to engage youth in positive activities, open access youth club, sexual health advice, careers guidance and reducing area Anti-social behaviour and NEETs (Not in Education or Employment) 16-18 yr olds.

We have over 400 registrants since Dec 2005 and have regular attendances per month between 300-400 youths over 12 sessions.

Actual project costs are £50,000 per annum, 10% of which goes back into local authority for rent for premises and employs 1 full time and 4 part time staff.

Recent client consultation exercise found 95% of youths rate our service a 9 or 10 out of 10. 

Please sign petition. to Downing Street, we are locally gathering signatures for petition to local Council Cabinet Meeting also.
